title: What happened

author: ruoxin tan
comment: I have been using this app everyday for years.  What happen lately it doesn't play anymore. It crushes even after reinstall it.

reply.author: Pavel Krayzman
reply.content: Hello, can you please write more specifically to my email what exactly experience did you had with device name and os version? Since you are the only one who complained about such thing. I know that there can be issue with Onplus devices but all others should work

title: Why doesn't it play anymore?

author: dave smeg
comment: The official app doesn't connect whereas this one does. Unfortunately there are too many adverts interrupting the songs whenever connection drops briefly. These ads are NOT in .977s stream.

reply.content: Unfortunately they are in 977 stream. I am not running any voice ads by myself at all..

author: Bảo Quốc
comment: Thanks to developers. Well done! But sometimes the notification just shows the App's name instead of singing song's name. In addition, it just changes the singing song name on tab Now Playing only when I turn back to that tab (after finishing a song). Could you make it to change in the background automatically? Seeing the list of songs in each Station (in real time) is also a good function.
